colophon_(төгсгөлийн_үг): @018A *, ,(CES RTA MGRIN GSAN SGRUB KYI SGO NAS RAB GNAS BYED TSUL BYIN RLABS KYI ROL MTSO ZHES BYA BA 'DI NI RAB GNAS CHO GA DU MA DANG, DAM PA'I PHYAG BZHES ME THONG BRGYUD BZHIN, RANG GZHAN LA PHAN 'DOD KYI BSAM PAS BTZUN GZUGS ^ DHARMA BADZRA GYIS, 'PHAR BA ZHES BYA LCAGS MO GLANG GI LO DBYAR DUS KYI DGA' MA LANG TSO NGAR LA BABS NA, SKYED MOS TSAL GYI BSTI GNAS YID DGA' CHOS 'PHEL DU SBYAR BA'I YI GE PA NI AOR DU SU DGE SLONG BLO BZANG KUN DGA' BGYIS PA SARBA DZA YANTU, ,BKRA SHIS DGE BAR 'PHEL GYUR CIG , ,,)
